title: Quiz  - SchemesTap 1st to 15th March 2023
instruction: SAMARTH Scheme is approved for implementation till March, 2024. The skilling programme under Samarth is implemented through Implementing Partners (IPs) comprising Textile Industry/ Industry Associations, State Government Agencies and Sectoral Organizations of Ministry of Textiles and NGOs/Societies etc. A centralized web-based Management Information System (MIS) has been put in place for monitoring and implementation of the scheme. MIS shall act as an integrated platform for registration and empanelment of Implementing Agencies.

quiz.text:
Which of the following statements is/are correct with respect to the above scheme?

A. Ministry of Railways is the nodal ministry for the scheme.

B. It was launched in the year 2022.

C. It aims for the ﻿development & modernization of stations on a continuous basis with long term vision.
options: A and B
A and C
B and C
A, B and C
None of the above

quiz.text:
Which of the following statements is/are correct with respect to the above scheme?

A. ﻿High level platforms (600-740 mm) shall be provided at all categories of stations.

B. ﻿Master Plan should have suitable spaces earmarked for 5G towers.

C. ﻿Amenities for Divyangjan at stations shall be as per guidelines issued by Railway Board.
options: B and C
A and C
A and B
A, B and C
None of the above

quiz.text:
Which of the following statements is/are correct with respect to the above scheme?

A. It is being implemented by Ministry of Rural Development.

B. The scheme was renamed as DAY-NRLM (Deendayal Antyodaya Yojana – National Rural Livelihood Mission)

C. It is a Central Sector Scheme.
options: A and B
A and C
B and C
A, B and C
None of the above

quiz.text:
Which among the following are the objectives of the scheme mentioned in above paragraph?

A. To mobilize 8-10 crore rural households into self-help groups in a time bound manner by 2024-25.

B. To reach out to 5 crore rural poor households of which 3.5 crore remain to be mobilized into the Self Help Groups (SHGs).

C. To bring about a sustainable improvement in the livelihoods of the urban people through building strong community institutions.
options: A and B
A and C
B and C
A, B and C
None of the above

quiz.text: Which among the following is not one of the components of the scheme mentioned in the above paragraph?
options: Aajeevika Grameen Express Yojana (AGEY)
National Rural Livelihoods Project (NRLP)
Mahila Kisan Sashaktikaran Pariyojana (MKSP)
Deen Dayal Upadhyaya Grameen Kaushalya Yojana
All of the above are the scheme components

quiz.text:
Which of the following statements is/are correct with respect to the above scheme?

A. It is being implemented by Ministry of Tribal Affairs.

B. It was launched in the year 1998-99.

C. It aims to ensure that tribal students get access to quality education in the remote tribal areas.
options: A and B
A and C
B and C
A, B and C
None of the above

quiz.text:
Which of the following statements is/are correct with respect to the above scheme?

A. Reservation of 10% seats under sports quota for deserving ST students who have excelled in the field of sports.

B. Funding under this Scheme would be 50% grant-in-aid by the Ministry of Tribal Affairs to NESTS (National Education Society for Tribal Students).

C. Every class can have maximum 40 students preferably in 2 sections of 20 students each and the total sanctioned strength of the school will be 320 students.
options: A and B
A and C
B and C
A, B and C
None of the above

quiz.text: What is the minimum ST population in percentage terms required in every block for implementation of the scheme mentioned in the above paragraph.
options: 25%
30%
40%
50%
60%

quiz.text:
Which of the following statements is/are correct with respect to the ECLGS?

A. Nodal ministry for the scheme is Ministry of Finance

B. Moratorium Period on principal amount is 2 year

C. 100% guarantee coverage is being provided by the National Credit Guarantee Trustee Company
options: A and C
A and B
B and C
A, B and C
None of the above

quiz.text: Interest rates under the above scheme are capped at 9.25% for Banks and Financial Institutions (FIs), and ____ for NBFCs.
options: 10.5%
11.5%
12.5%
14.0%
14.5%

quiz.text: As per the Budget Announcement 2022-23, Emergency Credit Line Guarantee Scheme is being extended up to March 2023 with an expanded guarantee cover of __________.
options: Rs. 3 lakh crore
Rs. 3.5 lakh crore
Rs. 4 lakh crore
Rs. 5 lakh crore
Rs. 5.5 lakh crore

quiz.text:
Which of the following statements is/are correct with respect to the above scheme?

A. ﻿Ministry of Electronics and Information Technology is the nodal ministry for the scheme.

B. It was launched in the year 2021.

C. Scheme was launched with an outlay of Rs 2600 Crore.
options: A and B
A and C
B and C
A, B and C
None of the above

quiz.text: The Incentive scheme for promotion of RuPay Debit Cards and low-value BHIM-UPI transactions (P2M) has been launched for ﻿One year i.e. FY2022-23, with effect from _________.
options: 1st January 2023
1st March 2022
1st March 2023
1st April 2022
None of the above

quiz.text: The Incentive scheme for promotion of RuPay Debit Cards and low-value BHIM-UPI transactions (P2M) is applicable to the banks having operations in _______ and transactions done in _________.
options: India
Anywhere outside India
India and abroad
All of the above
None of the above

quiz.text:
Which of the following statements is/are correct with respect to the above scheme?

A. It is being implemented by Ministry of Jal Shakti.

options: A and B

quiz.text:
Which of the following statements is/are correct with respect to the above scheme?

A. The project covers 8 states/UTs, 47 towns & 12 rivers.

B. It has been launched with financial outlay of Rs 22500 crore.

C. The program would be implemented by the National Mission for Clean Ganga (NMCG) at national level.
options: A and B
A and C
B and C
A, B and C
None of the above

quiz.text: Which among the following is not one of the pillars for the scheme mentioned in the above paragraph?
options: Sewerage Treatment Infrastructure
Afforestation
Public Awareness
River-Surface Cleaning
Ganga District

quiz.text:
Which of the following statements is/are correct with respect to the above scheme?

A. It is being implemented by Ministry of Jal Shakti.

B. It was launched in the year 2011.

C. It aims to ensure effective abatement of pollution and rejuvenation of the river Ganga.
options: A and B
A and C
B and C
A, B and C

quiz.text:
Which of the following statements is/are correct with respect to the functions of the scheme mentioned above scheme?

A. Implement the work programme of National Ganga River Basin Authority (NGRBA).

B. Implement the World Bank supported National Ganga River Basin Project.

C. Undertake any additional work or functions as may be assigned by MoWR,RD&GJ in the area of conservation of river Ganga.
options: A and B
A and C
B and C
A, B and C
None of the above

quiz.text: The management structure of the scheme mentioned in the above paragraph is divided into how many tiers?
options: 2 tiers
3 tiers
4 tiers
5 tiers
None of the above

quiz.text:
Which of the following statements is/are correct with respect to the above scheme?

B. It was launched in the year 2004.

C. LIC is the implementing agency for the above scheme.
options: A and B
A and C
B and C

quiz.text:
Which of the following statements is/are correct with respect to the above scheme?

A. Subscriber can exit only after completion of 5 years.

B. The National Securities Depository Limited (NSDL) is acting as the Central Record keeper for the NPS.

C. Contributions made towards the NPS are eligible for an additional tax deduction up to Rs 50,000.
options: A and B
A and C
B and C
A, B and C
None of the above

quiz.text: Who among the following are not one of the beneficiaries under the scheme mentioned in the above paragraph?
options: Any Indian Citizen, resident or non-resident or an Overseas Citizen of India between the age of 18 - 75 years.
All new employees of Central Government service (except Armed Forces) and Central Autonomous Bodies joining Government service on or after 1st January 2004.
All the employees of State Governments, State Autonomous Bodies joining services after the date of notification by the respective State Governments.
Private sector employees and unorganized sector workers
All of the above are beneficiaries

quiz.text:
Which of the following statements is/are correct with respect to the above scheme?

A. In 2014, the ‘Jan Aushadhi Scheme’ has been revisited and renamed as ‘Pradhan Mantri Bhartiya Janaushadhi Pariyojana’ (PMBJP).

B. Bureau of Pharma Public Sector Undertakings of India is implementing agency.

C. The medicines listed in the product list of PMBJP are procured only from World Health Organization – Good Manufacturing Practices (WHO-GMP) certified suppliers.
options: A and B
A and C
B and C
A, B and C
None of the above

quiz.text: What is the total number of Pradhan Mantri Bhartiya Jan Aushadhi Kendras which will be set up by December 2023?
options: 6000
8000
10000
12000
15000

quiz.text:
Which of the following statements is/are correct with respect to the incentives provided in the above mentioned scheme?

A. The incentive provided to the Kendra owners has been enhanced to up to Rs 5 lakh.

B. An additional one time incentive of Rs. 1 lakh has been approved for stores opened in specified area.

C. PMBJP Kendras run by women entrepreneurs, Divyang, SC, & ST gets an amount of Rs. 2 lakh as special incentive.
options: A and B
A and C
B and C
A, B and C
None of the above

quiz.text:
Which of the following statements are correct with respect to the above scheme?

A. Entry age for beneficiaries is between 18 to 40 years.

B. Members of EPF/ESIC are eligible to apply under this scheme.

C. Life Insurance Corporation of India (LIC) is the pension fund manager in this scheme.
options: A and B
B and C
A and C
A, B and C
None of the above

quiz.text: Under the above scheme, monthly contribution varies from Rs. ____ per month at the age of 18 years to Rs. _____ per month at the age of 40 years.
options: 27, 108
32, 128
46, 151
55, 200
55, 175

quiz.text: Choose the incorrect statement with respect to the above scheme.
options: Voluntary and contributory pension scheme on 50:50 basis
Matching contribution would be made by the Central Government
In case of death of subscriber, 75% of the pension is received by spouse in the form of family pension
If a subscriber died due to any cause (before age of 60 years), his/her spouse will have the option to exit the scheme OR join and continue the scheme
Aadhar card is mandatory for enrolment

quiz.text: What is the total number of target in the traditional sector to be trained in the above mentioned scheme?
options: 2 lakh
10 lakh
5 lakh
9 lakh

quiz.text: What is the mandatory placement of trainees in the Organised Sector?
options: 90%
80%
50%
70%

quiz.text: Which of the following sectors are excluded under the above scheme in the textile industry?
options: Knitting and Weaving
Spinning and Processing
